DougDoug.single_text: What's up Twitch chat?!  I'm DougDoug!  And today we're going to do some crazy wacky fucking stupid shit in GTA 5!
batch_texts: Hey! This is DougDoug. Where we solve problems no one has.
Today we're going to create three AI characters and have them fight to the death.
Buckle your seatbelts, chat! Today we're going to death road!
Ok, I went and trained a GPT AI on hundreds of conversations that I have had on Youtube and Twitch.

Grandma.sample_transcript: Can sit and talk to me and I'll ignore the other two. What is he? Orange? Yeah, yeah. Yeah, I hear him. Oh yeah.
Grandma.single_text: I don't think that PC will ever be back in stock, I imagine if it ever does, bots will snatch it up before a person can, heh.
batch_texts: I don't think that PC will ever be back in stock, I imagine if it ever does, bots will snatch it up before a person can, heh.
Monitors will be cheaper around this time of year I think because new monitor models are coming out 'soon'(tm).
Plus Samsung always has good .edu deals.
If looking for a new monitor, I always check rtings.com and Monitors Unboxed (on youtube).
